title: Amy Is Moving Kids To Home School + Bobby's Hotel Code Name
itunes:title: Amy Is Moving Kids To Home School + Bobby's Hotel Code Name
description:
Amy talks about transitioning her kids to home school. American Idol books Bobby's hotel under a code name. Also, the show competes to win a Classic TV show game!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
